items.sentence: The post office is just across from that store over there.
The traffic accident prevented me from catching the train.
Tom might\'ve been there yesterday, but I didn\'t see him.
It\'s not at all rare to live to be over ninety years old.
I\'m going to write their names down before I forget them.
When was the last time you went shopping with your mother?
What\'s something you\'ve done that you\'d never do again?
Tom took the early retirement package the company offered.
Tom took the letter, crumpled it and put it in his pocket.
Tom unhooked the fish and released it back into the water.
